mapper.select: SELECT trl.user_id, trl.rsv_date, tbi.branch_name, tbi.branch_tel, trl.select_time, (case when trl.select_time = 't1' then tri.t1_name when trl.select_time = 't2' then tri.t2_name when trl.select_time = 't3' then tri.t3_name when trl.select_time = 't4' then tri.t4_name when trl.select_time = 't5' then tri.t5_name when trl.select_time = 't6' then tri.t6_name when trl.select_time = 't7' then tri.t7_name when trl.select_time = 't8' then tri.t8_name when trl.select_time = 't9' then tri.t9_name when trl.select_time = 't10' then tri.t10_name end) as rsv_time FROM tb_reservation_list trl join tb_reservation_info tri on trl.branch_code = tri.branch_code and trl.rsv_month = tri.rsv_month join tb_branch_info tbi on trl.branch_code = tbi.branch_code WHERE trl.user_id = #{login_id} ORDER BY trl.rsv_date, rsv_time desc
mapper.delete: delete from tb_reservation_list where user_id = #{login_id} and rsv_date = #{rsv_date} and select_time = #{select_time}
